title: Setup Django Project
body: As a developer, I want to set up the Django project with all initial dependencies and configurations so the base app is ready for development.

title: Create Base Models
body: As a developer, I want to define models for cakes, orders, users, and reviews so the database schema supports the core features.

title: Setup Admin Panel
body: As a site admin, I want to manage cakes, orders, and users through Django admin for backend management.

title: Implement User Registration and Login
body: As a customer, I want to create an account and securely login/logout so I can manage my orders and profile.

title: Design Product List Page
body: As a user, I want to browse available cakes with image, title, and price so I can select one to view more details.

title: Integrate Stripe Payment
body: As a customer, I want to securely pay for my order using Stripe so my transaction is safe and seamless.

title: Add Customer Reviews
body: As a user, I want to leave and read reviews on cake listings so I can make informed decisions.

title: Deploy to Heroku
body: As a developer, I want to deploy the app to Heroku so users can access it online.
